item.title: Reboot
item.description: Here's a little story about the struggle between the internet as an archive and a web that wants to forget. The internet is a library, yes. But there are people wandering between the stacks. While the source material may need to be eternal, the thoughts, notes, scribbles and conversations that happen around them may sometimes best be forgotten.
